shortdesc.ph: Transcoding configurations for CDN live streaming.

pd.p: The width of the output media stream in pixels. The default value is 360.

ul.li: When the output media stream is video, ensure that width is set to 64 or higher. Otherwise, the Agora server adjusts the value to 64.
When the output media stream is audio, set width to 0.

pd.p: The height of the output media stream in pixels. The default value is 640.

ul.li: When the output media stream is video, ensure that height is set to 64 or higher. Otherwise, the Agora server adjusts the value to 64.
When the output media stream is audio, set height to 0.

plentry.pd: The width and height of the output media stream in pixels.
The video bitrate (Kbps) of the output media stream. The default value is 400. You can refer to Push Streams to CND for how to set the parameters.
The video frame rate (fps) of the output media stream. The default value is 15, and the value range is [1, 30].The Agora server adjusts any frame rate higher than 30 fps to 30 fps.

dlentry.dd: This attribute is deprecated since v2.8.0, and Agora does not recommend it.

plentry.pd: The video GOP (Group of Pictures) of the output media stream. The default value is 30.

pd.p: The video encoding configuration of the output media stream. See .
pd.note: If you set this parameter to any other value, Agora adjusts it to the default value.

plentry.pd: The codec type of the output video. For details, see .

pd.p: Transcoding configurations of each host. One live streaming channel supports up to 17 hosts. For details, see .

plentry.pd: The user SEI information embedded in the output media stream. This parameter is used to send SEI information to the CDN. The maximum length is 4096 bytes. See How to solve SEI-related issues.

The video background color of the output media stream. The format is a hexadecimal integer defined by RGB without the # symbol. For example, 0xFFB6C1 means light pink. The default value is 0x000000 (black).
The number of hosts in the transcoding. The default value is 0.

Deprecated: This attribute is deprecated.
The metadata sent to the CDN client.
The video watermark of the output media stream. Ensure that the format of the watermark image is PNG. For details, see .
The video background image of the output media stream. For details, see .
The audio sampling rate (Hz) of the output media stream. See .
The audio bitrate (Kbps) of the output media stream. The default value is 48, and the maximum is 128.

The number of audio channels of the output media stream. The default value is 1. Agora recommends setting it to 1 or 2.
1: (Default) Mono
2: Stereo.
3: Three audio channels.
4: Four audio channels.
5: Five audio channels.
The audio codec of the output media stream. For details, see .

pd.p: The number of watermarks of the output media stream.

ul.li: If you do not add a watermark or add only one watermark, this parameter is optional.
If you add more than one watermarks, ensure that you set this parameter.

pd.p: The number of background images of the output media stream.

ul.li: If you do not add a background image or add only one background image, this parameter is optional.
If you add more than one background images, ensure that you set this parameter.
